Class PerlActions

  • java.lang.Object
    • eg.projects.ProjectConfig
      • eg.projects.PerlActions
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Configurable, ProjectActions

    public final class PerlActions
extends ProjectConfig
implements ProjectActions
    Represents a programming project in Perl

      • configureProject

        public boolean configureProject(java.lang.String dir)
        If a project can be successfully configured based on the entries in the settings window.

        Creates the start command to run the Perl script

        Specified by:
        configureProject in interface Configurable
        Overrides:
        configureProject in class ProjectConfig
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory that may be or include the project's root folder
        Returns:
        if a project can be successfully configured

      • retrieveProject

        public boolean retrieveProject(java.lang.String dir)
        If a project stored in a preferences file can be retrieved.

        Method first looks for an 'eadconfig' file in dir or in parents of it and, if not present, in the preferences file in the program folder. Creates the start command to run the Perl script

        Specified by:
        retrieveProject in interface Configurable
        Overrides:
        retrieveProject in class ProjectConfig
        Parameters:
        dir - the directory of a file that maybe part of a stored project
        Returns:
        if the specified directory is part of a project whose configuration is stored in preferences file(s)

        public void runProject()
        Runs the Perl script and shows output in the console panel
        Specified by:
        runProject in interface ProjectActions
